channel.title: Talks By F. Burton Howard
channel.description: General Conference talks by F. Burton Howard.

image.title: General Conference talks by F. Burton Howard.

item.title: Be One with the Prophet
item.description: My brothers and sisters, I am deeply grateful for the love and confidence of the First Presidency, and for the sustaining vote of this conference that has brought me here before you at this time. I love the Lord and I love his work.

item.title: In Saving Others We Save Ourselves
item.description: For many months I have been away from the headquarters of the Church. I have learned much and have come to understand better many things I had known before. I have observed firsthand the challenges which confront Church members as they endeavor to bu

item.title: Repentance
item.description: Let me ask each of you to picture two crystal goblets in your mind. They differ in size and shape. They are both of good quality and have been well used. One has been carefully kept in a china cupboard. It is clean and polished. It is warm and inviti

item.title: Come Back to the Lord
item.description: From the beginning, prophets have called almost all men to repentance. Those who have not known about the gospel have been exhorted to abandon their sinful ways, keep the commandments, and join with the people of the Lord.

item.title: Repentance
item.description: While you will not remember, the last time I stood at this pulpit I spoke about repentance. I have elected to do so again.

item.title: Commitment
item.description: When my wife and I were first married, my parents lived in another state. During a break in our university schedule, we decided to go visit them.

item.title: Eternal Marriage
item.description: If you want something to last forever, you treat it differently. â€¦ It becomes special because you have made it so.
